title: The Art of Fabric Selection: Behind the Scenes
titleCn: 面料选择的艺术：幕后花絮
author: Julia
excerpt: Join Julia as she walks through the fabric selection process for a residential project — from first samples to final decisions.
excerptCn: 跟随Julia了解住宅项目的面料选择过程——从第一批样品到最终决策。
body:
In this video, Julia walks through the showroom with the design team, explaining how she evaluates texture, light behavior, durability, and how each fabric will age over time.

Key decisions covered:
- Why she always tests fabrics in the actual project lighting
- The difference between residential and contract-grade fabrics
- How to build a fabric story across a whole room
- When to splurge and when to save

Filmed at the D&D Building, New York.
bodyCn: 在这个视频中，Julia带着设计团队走过陈列室，解释她如何评估质地、光线表现、耐用性以及每种面料随时间的变化。
